original_text: So Pharaoh’s heart was hard and he would not let the Israelites go, just as the Lord had said through Moses.
korean_text: 바로의 마음이 완악하여 이스라엘 자손을 내보내지 아니하였으니 여호와께서 모세에게 말씀하심과 같더라

sentences.original_text: and he would not let the Israelites go
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 백성을 가게 하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: just as the Lord had said
